name: Paper - A Game of Folding
summary: Paper - A Game of Folding is an origami puzzle game suitable for all ages. Fold simulated paper into various shapes & try to match the target... You are given a score based on how accurate you are. The game's mechanics are easy to pick up and play, but as the levels progress you'll need to think more and more about your folds to become an origami master.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 休闲益智
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019年10月8日
  • 售价: ¥ 37
